name: Liar Band
description:
Liar Band is a music game made for Community Game Jam(https://itch.io/jam/cgj). The theme of that is "The Game Is A Liar"

It's my first music game made in 6 days.

I made all the resources and codes, but it has only 3 songs because time is not enough. 

This music game is not similar to others because the note symbol will "lie to you". I hope you can enjoy it! (Tips: you can use WASD keys and arrow keys at the same time).
